index.title: Website screenshot
index.description: Preview generator for your online pages.

viewport-resolution.title: Resolution
viewport-resolution.info: The viewport resolution is different from the display resolution. For instance, on a MacBook Pro 15", the display resolution is 2880x1800 and the viewport resolution is 1440x900.
viewport-resolution.input-error: Please enter a number between {0} and {1}

shadow.title: Shadow
shadow.info: The shadow will be less pronounced on the final image due to the scale of the preview.

index.request-error: An error has occurred. Please try again later.
index.preview-info: The final image might look different from this preview due to scaling.

download.hint: You can also save your image with a right clic.
